extDescr.message: Hide all your tabs at once with one single button and restore them later.

optTopDescr1.message: TabHide is an easy way to hide all of your tabs at once with a single click. It saves open tabs as bookmarks in a separate folder, after which it turns green and shows you the number of hidden tabs.

optTopDescr2.message: Another click on the TabHide restores all of the tabs you have hidden earlier. Tip - create keyboard shortcuts, password protect your saved tabs, and set safe pages!

optAdBestVPNService.message: best VPN service in the world

optAPPManual.message: Drag your chosen bookmark into the area above and click 'continue' to save your changes.

optAPPSetupManual.message: Simply choose one of your Chrome bookmarks, drag it into the area above and click 'save'.

optAPPSetupWarning.message: It is important that you remember which bookmark you chose and that its URL does not change or otherwise you will not be able to change your password while advanced protection is activated.

optCopyright.message: Copyright 2012 - Part of the HideMyAss.com extension family.

optHideIconDescr.message: Hide Tab Hide toolbar icon after activation

optPwdProtectDescr.message: set a password to protect your stored tabs

optSafePageDescr.message: Set a page to appear after Tab Hide activation

optSafePageWarningNoPage.message: no safe page selected: window will close

optShortcutDescr.message: Custom shortcut for Tab Hide activation (http:// and https:// only)
